title: Come On Down to Arousal Town!

description:
On today’s show, Emily is talking to you about what actually happens to our bodies when we get aroused, and she is taking your calls. 

She breaks down what monogamous relationships really are and what is considered cheating, what to do when you catch your pre-teen looking up porn on the internet, and the dos and don’ts for beginner BDSM play.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Cal Exotics, pjur, SiriusXM, Good Vibrations. 

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
